author: PTI
title: Over 100 flights delayed at Delhi airport due to bad weather
text: More than 100 flights were delayed at the Delhi airport on Friday morning due to bad weather conditions, an official said. The national capital witnessed dense fog resulting in low visibility. The official said over 100 flights have been delayed but there are no diversions so far. "While landing and takeoffs continue at Delhi Airport, flights that are not CAT III compliant may get affected. Passengers are requested to contact the airline concerned for updated flight information. Any inconvenience caused is deeply regretted," Delhi International Airport Ltd (DIAL) said in a post on X at 6.35 am. CAT III facility allows aircraft to operate in low visibility conditions. The Indira Gandhi International Airport (IGIA), operated by DIAL, handles around 1,300 flight movements daily.",

author: Christian K. Caruzo
title: Top Venezuelan Socialist and Alleged Drug Lord Claims to Win YouTube Award
text:
Venezuelan socialist regime strongman and long-suspected drug lord Diosdado Cabello claimed on Wednesday evening that YouTube awarded his television show Con el Mazo Dando (‚ÄúHitting with the Mallet‚Äù) a commemorative plaque for allegedly reaching 100,000 subscribers on its YouTube channel .
‚ÄúThey sent me this plaque, get wrecked, escualidos! [‚Äòscrawny ones,‚Äô a slang term for the opposition],‚Äù Cabello said , claiming that YouTube administrators sent him a letter ‚Äúcongratulating [him] for the content and international reach of the channel.‚Äù
‚ÄúThe vermin cut [my channels] every time they can,‚Äù he continued.
Cabello ‚Äúpredicted‚Äù that the award would lead to the closure of his YouTube channel, claiming that long-time critics, such as Venezuelan journalist Alberto Ravell, would ‚Äúexert pressure‚Äù to such an end.
‚ÄúNext week, they will knock down this channel. I guarantee it,‚Äù Cabello said. ‚ÄúYou will see because, here, the Ravells will get a hernia in because they have not even been thanked, and they were looking for me to give me the plaque.‚Äù
#EnFotos üì∑| Primer Vicepresidente del PSUV, @dcabellor dio a conocer que recibi√≥ una Placa del equipo de YouTube, en reconocimiento al crecimiento continuo de su canal Con El Mazo Dando. #DesinstalaElOdio pic.twitter.com/pIiOVvYfq0
‚Äî VTV CANAL 8 (@VTVcanal8) August 8, 2024
Cabello, a former member of the Venezuelan military, is widely known as one of the most powerful members of Venezuela‚Äôs authoritarian socialist regime, having occupied numerous high-ranking positions throughout the past 25 years. Cabello is presently the vice president of the ruling United Socialist Party of Venezuela (PSUV) and one of the lawmakers of the National Assembly, which the Maduro regime seized control of from the Venezuelan opposition through a sham election held in December 2020.
Cabello was a close ally of late socialist dictator Hugo Ch√°vez and was one of the military officials who participated in Ch√°vez‚Äôs failed February 1992 coup attempt against the government of former President Carlos Andr√©s P√©rez.
U.S. authorities have long accused Cabello of being one of the leading figures of the Cartel of the Suns, an intercontinental cocaine trafficking operation that high-ranking members of the Venezuelan military and some PSUV leading figures run.
Experts have accused the Cartel of the Suns of engaging in ‚Äúasymmetric warfare‚Äù against the United States by trafficking cocaine into the U.S. The socialist drug cartel is believed to have forged alliances with the Shiite jihadist organization Hezbollah and other drug trafficking organizations, such as the Mexican Sinaloa Cartel, the Marxist Revolutionary Armed Forces of Colombia (FARC), and the National Liberation Army (ELN) terrorist organization.
The Southern District of New York federal court indicted Cabello in March 2020 on charges of conspiracy to commit narco-terrorism, conspiracy to import cocaine, and associated firearms charges. Since then, U.S. authorities have enacted a still-active $10 million bounty for information that can lead to Cabello‚Äôs arrest and/or conviction. The Office of Foreign Assets Control sanctioned Cabello and included him on its Specially Designated Nationals list in 2018.
El Mazo , Cabello‚Äôs weekly Wednesday evening show, was launched in February 2014 amidst a wave of protests against the Maduro regime that took place at the time.
The show is infamously known for featuring Cabello espousing insults and issuing intimidating threats against journalists, activists, dissidents, and critics of the ruling socialist regime ‚Äî including presidents and government officials of other countries. El Mazo is commonly recorded in front of an audience of socialists, military officials, and other ‚ÄúVIP‚Äù guests. Socialist dictator Nicol√°s Maduro is a recurring guest on the show.
#VenezuelaSeRespeta
RESUMEN DEL PROGRAMA CON EL MAZO DANDO #489 (07-08-24)
¬°Revi√©ntense escu√°lidos! Youtube otorga placa de reconocimiento al canal de Con el Mazo Dando https://t.co/b9LaPpjZbp
Cabello: ¬°Nosotros lo advertimos! Edmundo Gonz√°lez es un asesino‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/tatr4MCBxm
‚Äî Con el Mazo Dando (@ConElMazoDando) August 8, 2024
Cabello‚Äôs show is broadcast locally through state-owned television channels, such as Venezolana de Television and TVes, and online platforms, such as YouTube . Both Cabello and his show have extensive presences across several social media platforms .
Several of the show‚Äôs past broadcasts have featured Cabello openly leaking private conversations between journalists or politicians that the socialist regime‚Äôs intelligence apparatus obtained by breaching the privacy of its participants in violation of Venezuela‚Äôs own privacy laws.
In 2015, the Inter-American Commission on Human Rights (IACHR) denounced Cabello and Con El Mazo Dando after the show revealed the names and exact locations of a group of people that had come before an IACHR hearing that took place at the time.
Google states that the plaques distributed throughout YouTube‚Äôs Creator Awards program are the video platform‚Äôs way of ‚Äúrecognizing the extraordinary effort creators put into their growing channels and to build thriving communities, responsibly.‚Äù
Christian K. Caruzo is a Venezuelan writer and documents life under socialism. You can follow him on Twitter here .
Latin America National Security Tech Diosdado Cabello Hugo Chavez Nicolas Maduro socialism Venezuela YouTube

author: @Dailyhuntapp
title: Glasgow student to drive ambulance to Rafah border to help evacuations from Gaza
text:
A Glasgow student is set to drive an ambulance to the Egypt-Gaza border to provide medical relief and to help evacuate civilians from Gaza.
On Thursday March 21, Umran Ali Javaid, a mature student at Glasgow Caledonian University, will set off from Glasgow in a second-hand ambulance equipped with a portable neonatal ventilator, providing breathing support for ill babies.
Travelling for "about six to seven days" to reach the Rafah border between Egypt and Gaza, his journey will see him take a ferry from Dover to France before travelling through Europe.
It is not the first time the international tourism and events student, who did not wish to share his age, has undertaken such a journey, as he personally drove another ambulance to the Polish-Ukrainian border to help refugees fleeing the Russian invasion in March 2022.
The journey to Gaza will see him deliver his 41st ambulance for humanitarian aid, some of which he has delivered by himself, and others he has delivered with friends.
"The ambulances I take save lives and that's why I continue doing this," Mr Javaid told the PA news agency.
"Ambulances are a good way to evacuate civilians from danger zones as it gives the injured temporary medical relief - they also have distinct markings, signs and sirens which makes them easier to identify.
"During the five-day ceasefire in Gaza, a journalist saw babies (in the hospital) in their mothers' arms passing away due to hunger as there were no portable ventilators and they could not be evacuated.
"The new ambulance I bought is kind of more of a high dependency unit to support the lives of infants - it could be used for decades if it's not bombed or shot.
"The ambulances I delivered to Ukraine only had basic equipment like defibrillators but the recent ones are better equipped to save lives."
Mr Javaid said he is expecting a greater challenge in taking an ambulance to Gaza than he faced journeying to Ukraine because nearby Poland had been "very accommodating" with a "clear structure of bringing in aid".
"The first time I went to the Gaza Strip, I was the driver for a convoy and didn't know what I was doing but saw the difference ambulances make in saving lives," said Mr Javaid, who will be visiting Gaza for a third time.
"When the Ukraine war happened I was there during the first couple of weeks and there were thousands of people needing help and seeing children and mothers in pain stayed with me," said Mr Javaid.
The five-month-old war that was triggered by Hamas's October 7 massacre in southern Israel has killed more than 30,000 Palestinians and driven some 80% of Gaza's 2.3 million people from their homes.
The UN says a quarter of the population is starving.
The militant attack that sparked the conflict killed around 1,200 people and saw some 250 taken hostage.
Speaking in Westminster, Foreign Secretary Lord David Cameron said: "If Israel really wanted to help, they could open Ashdod port which is in Israel, which is a fully functioning port that could really maximise the delivery of aid from Cyprus straight into Israel and therefore into Gaza."
With an approval from COGAT (Co-ordination of Government Activities in the Territories) in Israel and the Egyptian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Mr Javaid would be handing over the ambulance to UN agency UNRWA, the largest humanitarian organisation working inside Gaza.
"I know I can make a difference since I have been doing this for a while and have experience," he added.
As Mr Javaid moves towards the conclusion of his studies, he plans to start an events company and use the profits to provide humanitarian aid.
"I started studying so that I can organise my own events," he said.
"This is still in the planning stage but I will organise a big event/festival for families for thousands of people.
"It will be my own business however the profit I make, a part of that will help me buy ambulances on a larger scale. I will donate ambulances to UK care homes and donate them abroad too."
Leo Varadkar denies softening language on Gaza during US trip
O'Neill vows to press Biden to be a 'strong partner for peace' in Middle East
First Minister to 'watch a proper game of cricket' after standing down
Cheltenham Festival goer suffers serious head injuries during assault

author: @nbcdfw
title: ERCOT says grid is ‚Äòabsolutely ready‚Äô for freeze ‚Äì NBC 5 Dallas-Fort Worth
text:
With all eyes on the Texas power grid, Pablo Vegas, the head of ERCOT insisted Friday that there‚Äôs no reason to expect a repeat of February 2021 when more than four million homes were left in the dark.
‚ÄúI want to let you know and reassure you that we are using every tool in our toolbox to make sure the grid is absolutely ready and prepared to deliver energy to all Texans throughout this weather event. The grid is better prepared than it has ever been before in particular as it relates to cold weather events like that is approaching,‚Äù said Vegas.
For now, the system operator isn‚Äôt calling for conservation.
But come Tuesday morning, its forecast shows demand narrowing at times within a few hundred megawatts of the available supply, narrowing again Tuesday night.
 ‚ÄúTuesday morning, we're likely to set an all-time wintertime demand record,‚Äù said Rice University environmental engineering professor Daniel Cohan.
Cohan said tight conditions will come first with the arrival of the storm‚Äôs coldest temps and later, as wind and solar power drop off.
‚ÄúThey're pretty optimistic about how well the coal and gas plants are going to perform next week. That's not been the case the past few winter storms that we've had. We know maintenance steps have been done, and really remains to be seen whether those thermal power plants, many of them more than 30 years old, hold up as well as ERCOT expects them to,‚Äù said Cohan.

author: Nouvelles
title: Les enfants d'Una Healy retrouvent leur p√®re pour No√´l aux √âtats-Unis
text:
Les enfants d‚ÄôUna Healy, Aoife Belle et Tadhg, ont retrouv√© le c√¥t√© paternel de la famille alors qu‚Äôils passent No√´l aux √âtats-Unis cette ann√©e.
Dans le cadre de l‚Äôaccord de coparentalit√© entre Una et son ex-mari Ben Foden, ils re√ßoivent chacun les enfants ¬´ tous les deux ans ¬ª pour cette journ√©e sp√©ciale et cette ann√©e, c‚Äô√©tait le tour de Ben.
L‚Äôancien joueur de rugby anglais vit en Am√©rique avec sa nouvelle √©pouse Jackie et leurs deux enfants, Farrah et Olympia, alors Aoife et Tadhg ont travers√© l‚Äô√©tang pour No√´l.
Una Healy avec ses enfants Aoife Belle et Tadgh./Pic : Instagram
Jackie a partag√© une photo de tous les enfants de la famille Foden sous le sapin de No√´l v√™tus de pyjamas assortis alors qu‚ÄôAoife et Tadhg retrouvaient leurs demi-fr√®res et s≈ìurs, en √©crivant : ‚ÄúJoyeux No√´l √† tous et bonne nuit √† tous.‚Äù
Cela survient apr√®s qu‚ÄôUna a ouvertement d√©clar√© qu‚Äôelle n‚Äôavait pas le luxe de passer les vacances avec ses enfants et a c√©l√©br√© No√´l quelques jours plus t√¥t avant de se rendre chez leur p√®re.
Una Healy et Ben Foden. Photo : Getty Images
La coparentalit√© est un peu plus d√©licate pour elle et son ex car l‚Äôancien couple, qui s‚Äôest s√©par√© en 2018, vit d√©sormais sur des continents diff√©rents et elle a admis qu‚Äôelle ressentait pour ¬´ tous les autres parents c√©libataires dans la m√™me situation ¬ª.
Lui partageant une photo d‚Äôelle et de ses deux enfants page de m√©dias sociaux, Una a √©crit : ¬´ Cette ann√©e, nous avons pass√© notre ¬´ jour de No√´l ¬ª √† Cork. Tous les deux ans, depuis quelques ann√©es, nous n‚Äôavons pas pu passer No√´l ensemble, et c‚Äôest une chose √† laquelle je ne m‚Äôhabituerai jamais compl√®tement, surtout lorsqu‚Äôils sont encore si jeunes.
¬´Je compatis avec tous les autres parents c√©libataires dans la m√™me situation cette ann√©e. Je vous souhaite √† tous un tr√®s joyeux No√´l et une bonne ann√©e, du mien √† la v√¥tre.
Ben et sa nouvelle √©pouse Jackie, qu‚Äôil a √©pous√©e le jour o√π son divorce avec Una a √©t√© finalis√©, partagent deux filles, Farrah, quatre ans, et Olympia, 10 mois.
Ben Foden avec ses quatre enfants. (Photo : Ben Foden/Instagram)
En ao√ªt, Aoife et Tadhg se sont envol√©s pour les √âtats-Unis pendant leurs vacances d‚Äô√©t√© apr√®s avoir quitt√© l‚Äô√©cole de Tipperary, o√π ils vivent avec leur m√®re, et ont rencontr√© pour la premi√®re fois leur nouveau fr√®re Olympia, n√© en f√©vrier.
Una a √©galement parl√© √† Vogue Williams sur son podcast Taboo Talk with Boots, o√π elle a r√©v√©l√© qu‚Äôelle avait l‚Äôimpression qu‚Äôelle devait s‚Äô√©loigner de l‚Äôendroit o√π elle vivait avec Ben parce qu‚Äôelle se sentait ‚Äúg√™n√©e‚Äù et que ‚Äútous les yeux √©taient riv√©s sur elle‚Äù.
Una Healy √† l‚Äô√©v√©nement Queens of Archive pour c√©l√©brer leurs collections de v√™tements de f√™te chez Brown Thomas et Arnotts, qui s‚Äôest tenu √† Row Wines. Photo: Kieran Harnett
‚ÄúVous avez toujours l‚Äôimpression d‚Äô√™tre jug√© par les gens et vous voyez toujours les couples et les familles et vous vous sentez tellement seule parce que ce n‚Äôest plus vous‚Äù, se souvient la m√®re de deux enfants.
Nous vous souhaitons tout le meilleur pour No√´l cette ann√©e, Una et tous ceux qui ne pourront pas passer les vacances avec leurs enfants.

author: @wfsbnews
title: Egg prices are increasing this holiday season
text:
Egg prices are increasing this holiday season
COLCHESTER, CT (WFSB) - As the holidays approach, egg prices are going up.
Channel 3 advised customers that prices might be higher the next time they shop for eggs.
Some people may also have a hard time finding eggs in the aisles.
‚ÄúIt‚Äôs the perfect storm for high prices in the egg industry right now,‚Äù said Hershal Tyles, General Manager of Mitlitsky Eggs.
This is a busy time of year at Mitlitsky Eggs in Lebanon. Their warehouse is usually chock-full.
However, product is moving quickly and the warehouse is seeing empty space.
‚ÄúThere‚Äôs a lot of panic buying,‚Äù Tiles said.
The Bird Flu is partly to blame for this situation.
‚ÄúWe‚Äôve seem some outbreaks in the last month in Iowa. And that affected close to 10-million birds and that sent the market to the races,‚Äù Tiles explained.
Mitlitsky‚Äôs suppliers have not been impacted, but many others are, causing stores to increase prices.
Noel‚Äôs Market Manager, Bob Crowell, is getting the store ready for Christmas shoppers. Eggs seem to be on everyone‚Äôs list.
‚ÄúWe were one of the lowest prices in town, everyone was coming here, then we had a spike from our retailer also so... all the prices are in line now," Crowell said.
Crowell mentioned that some eggs have been hard to get, especially the 18-packs.
Keri Vincent often shops for her eggs at Noel‚Äôs.
‚ÄúI really only ever come here because they seem to be the freshest,‚Äù she said.
Some states require cage free hens, but that increases the price of eggs even more.
‚ÄúThe cost rolls down to the consumer. Consumers are used to paying a dollar or two for eggs. Now they‚Äôre up on the shelves for five or six dollars,‚Äù said Matt Mitlitsky from Mitlitsky‚Äôs eggs.
Inflation is yet another factor causing this increase in egg prices.
‚ÄúThey will come down. They go up and down every year. It was a record low for a while, then it shot back up,‚Äù Crowell said.
After the holidays, the demand for eggs should go down, which will help to lower the prices.
However, as winter approaches, storms could fluctuate prices again.
Copyright 2024 WFSB. All rights reserved.

title: #67 Milei elimina el organismo que investigaba el robo de ni√±os durante la dictadura argentina
text:

[#1](c1#c-1) Es que no hay plata, y adem√°s, los ni√±os ya est√°n robados y no se van a destinar, as√≠ que ¬øpara qu√© gastarse la pasta?
A ver qu√© dice el subnormal de siempre respecto a esto. Seguro que es capaz de decir que esos ni√±os han sido vendidos y no puede pedirse su devoluci√≥n o algo similar.

"Seg√∫n la organizaci√≥n pro derechos humanos Abuelas de Plaza de Mayo, cerca de 500 beb√©s fueron robados por la dictadura a sus progenitores, en su mayor√≠a opositores al r√©gimen. En muchos casos, sostiene la organizaci√≥n, las madres que dieron a luz en centros clandestinos de detenci√≥n y tortura, fueron desaparecidas para siempre, asesinadas o tiradas con vida al mar."

Pero es que yo los insultos del calibre de este usuario es que deber√≠a estar baneado por el resto del los d√≠as.
[#37](c37#c-37) Pero a√∫n no tienes a ese ente en el ignore? si de cada 10 palabras 20 son insultos...

[#48](c48#c-48) No uso mucho el ignore, solo tengo a un usuario, el que no quiere hacer crecer a sus hijos en la miseria...
[#27](c27#c-27) La cuesti√≥n es si es necesario un organismo solo para eso o puede derivarse a otro ya existente.
[#29](c29#c-29) Vaya, qu√© sorpresa, uno de los seres con mayor nivel de miseria de esta web, y mira que el nivel es alto, alegr√°ndose de que no puedan investigarse los secuestros de ni√±os en una dictadura. Por lo que sea, eh?
Pues ya solo con el banco gen√©tico que ha creado ya tiene mayor utilidad que la que puedan tener 10000 seres como t√∫ en 10000 vidas.
[#31](c31#c-31) ¬øQui√©n se ha alegrado de nada?
Resultados, hay un estudio gen√©tico, ok, ¬øCuales son los resultados?
Tu si que eres miserable...
El gobierno dice que el organismo actuaba "por iniciativa propia, para la individualizaci√≥n de los responsables de posibles hechos criminales"
A los que defienden la libertad no les gusta que los organismos sean independientes, sobre todo estos organismos que TIENEN LA OBLIGACION de ser independientes de cualquier gobierno o ideolog√≠a pol√≠tica.
Espero que alguien viole la LOPD y ponga esos archivos a salvo
[#56](c56#c-56) Si tienes empat√≠a, dona a una ONG o asociaci√≥n que realice esa tarea. Que yo no quiera que esto sea financiado coercitivamente/via impuestos no significa en absoluto que est√© en contra de que se realice la tarea, de forma privada.
La empat√≠a, con el dinero propio, no con el ajeno.
[#23](c23#c-23) Es lo que sospecho, se centran en el n√∫mero de ni√±os robados, los que reconocen ciertos organismos y los que reconoce el gobierno, pero ¬øy los logros de este organismo? ¬øcu√°l es la justificaci√≥n del gasto? ¬øHay que soltar billetes aunque no haya resultados?
[#4](c4#c-4) Ni de ti me esperaba defender semejante indignidad. Tiempo suficiente es todo el necesario para la resoluci√≥n de todos los casos de un crimen tan atroz como es robar seres humanos. Y son cientos.
[#10](c10#c-10) Semejante personaje despreciable. Como si fuera una "investigaci√≥n" que tarda un tiempo concreto. Es un organismo que se encarga de hacer pruebas de ADN a la poblaci√≥n para buscar familiares cercanos de gente que en la mayor√≠a de los casos es por sospecha que puede ser un ni√±o robado o los familiares terminan confesando...
No se puede caer m√°s bajo que defender algo as√≠.
[#10](c10#c-10) No s√© c√≥mo te aguantas y llamas simplemente ¬´indigno¬ª a un saco de mierda as√≠. En serio, todo mi respeto a tu templanza
[#4](c4#c-4) Han tenido 20 a√±os para investigar eso
Eso no es completamente cierto. En el art√≠culo dicen claramente que fue fundada en el 92. No han tenido 20 a√±os, han tenido 30.
Y teniendo en cuenta que 10 a√±os antes ya estaba la Comisi√≥n Nacional por la Desaparici√≥n de Personas que hac√≠a lo mismo y cuyas funciones luego asumi√≥ el organismo que ha cerrado Milei, en realidad han tenido 40 a√±os.
[#28](c28#c-28) Hace 40 a√±os no habia la capacidad de hacer tests gen√©ticos en cantidad, disponibilidad y coste como la que hay ahora.
[#38](c38#c-38) Las pruebas gen√©ticas para investigar la filiaci√≥n con personas desaparecidas las lleva el Banco Nacional de Datos Gen√©ticos y son gratuitas. Para quien tiene sospechas de ser hijo/a de alg√∫n desaparecido, quien realmente resuelve el tema es est√° organizaci√≥n, a la que cualquiera puede acudir y que adem√°s lo hace de forma gratuita. No necesitas a√±adir una capa de burocracia adicional en forma de otra organizaci√≥n.
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banco_Nacional_de_Datos_Gen√©ticos
[#4](c4#c-4) Te voy a poner un ejemplo: Espa√±a
Aqu√≠ hemos tenido 50 a√±os (y contando) y todav√≠a hay un mont√≥n de barbaridades que se hicieron en la dictadura de Franco que siguen sin saberse.
Y eso es as√≠ porque todav√≠a hay gente viva y con poder, interesada en que no se sepa.
Y en Argentina, igual. Y esa gente con poder ha votado a Milei para que parara esas investigaciones, no sea que se descubra que alg√∫n heredero de una familia de bien resulta que tiene genes de rojo piojoso.
[#30](c30#c-30) Precisamente. Este es de los que dice que no hay que reabrir heridas del pasado obviando que los delitos de lesa humanidad no prescriben
[#50](c50#c-50) Viniendo del t√≠o que llama fascistas a los que piden acabar con los difusores de fake news racistas, en realidad tu opini√≥n respecto a esto se pod√≠a intuir. Has confirmado lo que pareces esmerarte en demostrar cada d√≠a; das asco. No eres m√°s que otro ultra conservador sin escr√∫pulos, como tu m√°ximo h√©roe, el soci√≥pata Milei.

author: GlobeNewswire
title: Cytek¬Æ Biosciences Becomes First Company to Add Ability to Detect Subcellular Particles to Its Cell Sorter | The Manila Times
text:
World's First Enhanced Small Particle (ESP‚Ñ¢) Detection Sorter Enables Effective Content Isolation; Opens Door to Scientific Discoveries
FREMONT, Calif., Nov. 07, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Cytek Biosciences, Inc. (Nasdaq: CTKB) has introduced an Enhanced Small Particle (ESP‚Ñ¢) Detection Option for its Cytek Aurora‚Ñ¢ CS system . This is the first commercially available small particle detector on a cell sorter and offers a significant advancement for rapidly evolving research fields, including in drug delivery, cell therapy, disease diagnostics, circulating tumor cells, regenerative medicine, and vaccine delivery. Researchers can now achieve downstream analysis of materials that were previously unable to be sorted, opening new possibilities for breakthroughs in these areas.
Once regarded as cellular debris, exosomes and extracellular vesicles (EVs) are now recognized as pivotal to cell-to-cell communication, disease progression, and therapeutic delivery. With the surge in research interest driven by technological innovations, EVs have become central to a growing body of scientific publications and clinical trials. With Cytek's ESP Detection Option, particles as small as 70 nm can now be studied and sorted for downstream analysis, giving researchers the ability to characterize the full emission spectra of small particles.
"As the first company to offer the ESP Detection Option on a cell sorter, we are setting a new standard for small particle research,‚Äù said Ming Yan, Ph.D., CTO of Cytek Biosciences. "The enhanced capabilities of our Cytek Aurora CS system not only push the boundaries of scientific discovery but also may open up new markets for Cytek. Researchers can now explore areas previously beyond their reach, accelerating both scientific progress and potential commercial opportunities.‚Äù
